metadata.title: CVE-2022-27383 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: MariaDB Server v10.6 and below was discovered to contain an use-after-free in the component my_strcasecmp_8bit, which is exploited via specially crafted SQL statements.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.5 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
